TEXT.TITLE: BALL <BLL> ENDS TALKS WITH MONSANTO <MTC>
TEXT.BODY: Ball Corp said it was unable to complete negotiations to acquire the plastic container business of Monsanto Co. It said the two companies had entered into exclusive negotiations last October. Neither company provided details on why the talks were terminated. Reuter
